column1: | for rosemarie m. schlagenhaft rosemarie m. rosie schlagenhaft
column8: 2015 at house of the dove. a mass of christian burial will be held at 10:30 am on thursday at st. johns catholic church
column9: with rev. samuel martin officiating. burial will take place in gate of heaven cemetery. the visitation will be held from 4:00 pm until 8:00 pm on wednesday at rembs funeral home and from 9:30 am until service time at st. johns catholic church. st. johns parish council of catholic women rosary service will be held at 4:00 pm on wednesday at the funeral home. rosemarie was born on september 26
column11: the daughter of isadore and margaret (stini) donnerbauer. she attended nasonville elementary school and was a 1974 graduate of marshfield senior high school. she was united in marriage to paul j. schlagenhaft on september 24
column13: bakerville. rosies pastimes and hobbies included foremost
column14: spending time with her husband and best friend
column15: paul. she also especially enjoyed shopping
column16: reading a good book and planting summer flowers. she made many great memories with her brothers and sisters
column17: her children and their families and her many friends. she took great pride in her employment at v & h trucks
column18: inc. she is lovingly survived by her husband
column21: luke (tonya) schlagenhaft of spencer and their children
column24: lindsey (tim) sabelko of mondovi who are expecting a child. she is also survived by siblings
column28: and peter (linda) donnerbauer of marshfield. she was predeceased by her parents
column29: isadore and margaret donnerbauer and siblings
column32: all in infancy. condolences may be sent online to www. rembsfh. com upcoming events17. jun. wednesday visitation4:00 pm - 8:00 pm rembs funeral home300 s. oak ave.
